0x82E794B7.name: GET_VEHICLE_GEAR_RATIO

params.name: gear
params.description: The vehicles gear you want to get.

0x82E794B7.description: Gets vehicles gear ratio on choosen gear.

examples.code:
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(-1))
local currentGear = GetVehicleCurrentGear(Vehicle)

print(GetVehicleGearRatio(vehicle, currentGear)) -- will print current vehicle gear to console
